author: Lucas Nolan
title: WSJ: China Floods Facebook and Twitter with Chinese Virus Disinformation
description: In a recent article, the Wall Street Journal outlines how China has begun spreading viral messages in an attempt to shape the narrative of the Wuhan coronavirus pandemic. The communist country's state-run media outlets have been allowed by Twitter and Faceboo…
content: In a recent article, the Wall Street Journal outlines how China has begun spreading viral messages in an attempt to shape the narrative of the Wuhan coronavirus pandemic. The communist country’s state-run media outlets have been allowed by Twitter and Faceboo… [+3450 chars]
